file_content.text: Your investigatory skills are most impressive!
Thank you for accepting a contract from the Bounty Brokers Association!
Proceed to the planet specified in the contract to meet the client and gather the details of the bounty. Good hunting!
With the client's information, you should be able to find local miscreants who can provide more details.
Please do not hesitate to question them aggressively!
You have all that you need--neutralize the target!
Impressive lethality. Notify the client of your success!
A nonlethal approach? Intriguing. A fine prize for the client!
Your investigations would be more effective if you carried them out on the planet specified in the contract....
The Bounty Brokers Association is quite impressed with the efficiency and skill displayed in your contract resolutions! Well done!
